_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Hytale
author: steev@slpnetwork.de

installation.script:
hytale_zip="hytale-downloader.zip"
assets_zp= "Assets.zip"
found_archive=""

if [[ ! -d /mnt/server ]]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server
fi

cd /mnt/server

echo "installing unzip"
apt update
apt install -y unzip wget file

echo "downloading hytale server downloader"
wget https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip

unzip -q -o $hytale_zip
chmod +x "hytale-downloader-linux-amd64"
echo "you will need to authorize with hytale" 
./hytale-downloader-linux-amd64

echo "searching for hytale server"
 
for file in *.zip; do
    [[ -e "$file" ]] || continue
    if [[ "$file" != "$DOWNLOADER_ZIP" && "$file" != "$ASSETS_ZIP" ]]; then
        echo "server found: $file"
        found_archive=$file

        break
    fi
done

if [[ -z "$found_archive" ]]; then
    echo "something went wrong no server found"
    exit 1
fi

echo "starting installation of server from zip file: $found_archive"
unzip $found_archive

echo "clean up"
rm -f hytale-downloader* 
rm -f "$DOWNLOADER_ZIP"
rf -f ".hytale-downloader-credentials.json"
rm "$found_archive"

echo "moving server"

FOLDER_NAME="${found_archive%.zip}"

if [[ -d "Server" ]]; then
    target="Server"
elif [[ -d "$FOLDER_NAME" ]]; then
    target="$FOLDER_NAME"
fi

if [[ -n "$target" ]]; then
    echo "Log: Verschiebe Dateien aus /$target in das Hauptverzeichnis..."
    shopt -s dotglob
    mv "$target"/* .
    shopt -u dotglob
    rmdir "$target"
fi

rm -rf "Server"
echo "install complete starting server"
